amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit $400,000 from being used for the renovation of a vacant building for economic development by the City of Jal, New Mexico.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 111-219 to prohibit $400,000 from being used for the renovation of a vacant building for economic development by the City of Jal, New Mexico, and reduce the amount of the appropriate section by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 125 - 310 (Roll no. 630).
